about_the_game:
In this sequel to the hit cozy management sim, build the cat cafe of your dreams and explore a folkloric city full of secrets and stray cats.

After a faerie feline possesses your smartphone (it's a whole thing), you discover a magical force is twisting people's hearts to feel lonely and isolated. It's up to you to ease their worries and fill their hearts with delight using the power of cats, coffee and community.✨

💗 DELIGHT YOUR COMMUNITY

Take care of your cats so they are happy, healthy and loved, and they'll delight your customers with their fuzzy company and occasional wild antics.
🖌️ Decorate your cafe and prepare 🍰 tasty treats to keep your customers coming back.

🗺️ EXPLORE A FOLKLORIC CITY

Venture outside your cafe and explore the many colorful regions of an expansive bustling city full of useful ingredients, crafting materials, hidden secrets, and stray cats (of course!)

🐈 GOTTA ADOPT 'EM ALL

Approach stray fur-babies using the ancient pst-pst-pst technique and meet them in turn-based cat-counters. Figure out what they like and dislike to slowly win their trust.

🐱 CARE FOR YOUR CATS

Each cat has a unique personality, so figure out their favorite foods, give them little baths and play, cuddle and pet to keep them feelin' feline-- I mean, fine. You can even train them to help you explore using cat companion skills such as:
  • ⛏️ Burrow Paws to dig up hidden treasure
  • 👃 Power Snoot for sniffing out neat secrets
  • 💪🏻 Mighty Mittens to push aside big boulders and stuff

👋 MEET THE SHOPKEEPS

Join Cuttycrumb Lane’s tight-knit community of shopkeepers. Meet new friends as well as many returning faces from Cat Cafe Manager. Get to know them, buy from their shops, and make sure they’re doing OK. Over time, learn to work together as a community.

🧙‍♀️ UNCOVER AN AGE-OLD SECRET

Something old is stirring in the woods, and stirring up trouble. To stop this grim force, enlist the help of tiny cat faeries and uncover the old stories of the witches' coven.

✏️ A NEW 2.5D ARTSTYLE

Inspired by Studio Ghibli, 90's shoujo anime and our own city lives, experience a fresh vibe combining 2D hand-animated characters and a fully 3D city full of hand-painted details.

name: Cat Cafe Manager 2: Big City Bliss

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In this cozy management lifesim, care for cute cats & customers while exploring a bustling folkloric city. Build the cat cafe of your dreams and fill hearts with delight using the power of cats, coffee and community 🐱
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
